# BET Award for Best Male R&B/Pop Artist

The BET Award for Best Male R&B/Pop Artist is awarded to the overall best male contemporary R&B, soul, and pop singers who have released an album the previous or same year. The all-time winner in this category is Chris Brown with eight wins, he is also the most nominated artist with eighteen nominations.
